sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The cURL package contains curl, curl-config and the libcurl libraries.

sect3.title: curl
sect3.para: curl is a client that can get documents from or send documents to any of the following protocols: HTTP, HTTPS (needs ), FTP, GOPHER, DICT, TELNET, LDAP (needs ) or FILE.

sect3.title: curl-config
sect3.para: curl-config prints information about the last compile, like libraries linked to and prefix setting.

sect3.title: libcurl
sect3.para: libcurl provides the functionality of curl to other programs.
